page.title: 02EDUCATION
page.content:
EDUCATION-Education is compulsory for all children between the ages of 5 and 16.In Worcester there are three levels of Education- PRIMARY,SECONDARY AND TERTIARY.Primary Schools cater for pupils in the 5 to 11 year age range. Some Primary Schools have Nursery Units for pre-school age children.The Secondary Sector is for those between 11 & 16 years with a 6th-Form College and Technical College for those who wish to further their education to 18. The Tertiary level is at Universities, Colleges and Polytechnics. Four schools in this block have helped on the Domesday Project. They are:-
Cherry Orchard Primary Sch. Worcester Whittington Primary Sch. Whittington Nunnery Wood Primary Sch. Worcester Stanley Road Primary Sch. Worcester this school also has a Nursery Unit.
